title: Plan for living
creator_credit: Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Shows scenes where early settlers landed in Australia; early views of the cities of Australia; construction of buildings post 1949 and general living conditions and development of the cities of Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
